original_text: And they stood up in their place, and read in the book of the law of the Lord their God one fourth part of the day; and another fourth part they confessed, and worshipped the Lord their God.
korean_text: 이 날에 낮 사분의 일은 그 제자리에 서서 그들의 하나님 여호와의 율법책을 낭독하고 낮 사분의 일은 죄를 자복하며 그들의 하나님 여호와께 경배하는데

sentences.original_text: And they stood up in their place
and read in the book of the law of the Lord their God
one fourth part of the day
and another fourth part they confessed
sentences.korean_translation: 또 다른 사분의 일 동안 그들이 자백하고

sentences.original_text: and worshipped the Lord their God
